widget.name: MobileHideSplash
widget.description: A widget that hides the PhoneGap/Cordova native splash screen. Requires the cordova-plugin-splashscreen plugin to be included in your hybrid mobile app. As of 6.5.1, this was in the default hybrid config file. Place this widget on your master layout, and use this in conjunction with this line in your config.xml file: preference name="AutoHideSplashScreen" value="false"
